title: From Our Home Correspondent 25/06/17
content: Mishal Husain presents four dispatches, including Annalena McAfee on a Cotswold utopia, Ed Smith on leadership in cricket and John Ashton on the diabetes he, like his father, has.
contentSnippet: Mishal Husain presents four dispatches, including Annalena McAfee on a Cotswold utopia, Ed Smith on leadership in cricket and John Ashton on the diabetes he, like his father, has.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 4
itunes.subtitle: A Cotswold utopia, treating diabetes, the nightingale and leadership in cricket feature
itunes.summary: Mishal Husain presents four dispatches, including Annalena McAfee on a Cotswold utopia, Ed Smith on leadership in cricket and John Ashton on the diabetes he, like his father, has.
